name: DON'T HIT AND RUN
description:
- You're Trapped In A Creepy House And You Need To Escape Through The Main Door.

- Be Careful.. You Aren't Alone, The Place Is Swarming With Invisible Walking Skeletons.

- You Can't See Them, And They Can't See You Too.

- If You Get Really Close To Them... They Will Hurt You.

- However You Can Use Your Charged Laser To Find And Detect Those Skeletons For A Short Time.

- The Laser Won't Last Forever.. But You May Find Some Batteries Around.
